name: SOCIETY FOR PEOPLES ACTION IN RURAL SERVICE AND HEALTH (SPARSH) GADCHIROLI
briefDescription: SPARSH has working in the tribal dominated and Naxal affected Gadchiroli, Chandrapur and Gondia district of Maharashtra State. The Board of Trustees consists of 7 members. The organization comprises 09 staff members working in various levels with 12 volunteer. SPARSH is a unique organisation who has tackling the issue of “GAOKOR”. Our work on Gaokor had covered by leading international newspaper ‘The Guardian. Living in the gaokor in this difficult time is a horrible predicament for tribal women and girls. Hundreds of them have to go through this life threatening situation. SPARSH had visited more than 225 Gaokor and took many initiative to awareness generation in girls and women on menstrual health for eradication of this fatal custom.
